featured.text: A redefinition of the term “olive oil” is also proposed to make a clear distinction between virgin olive oil and pure olive oil.

definition.zh_def: 重新定義，對某個詞語、概念或事物的定義進行修改或更新。
definition.en_def: The act of defining something again or differently, often to clarify or change its meaning.
definition.example: The redefinition of the term has led to new interpretations in the field.
